# My Winter Car - Localization Configuration
# This file configures language-specific settings for the localization plugin

# Language metadata
LANGUAGE_NAME = Korean
LANGUAGE_CODE = ko-KR

# Unicode character ranges for localized text detection
# Format: START-END,START-END (hexadecimal values)
# Korean ranges: AC00-D7AF (Hangul Syllables), 1100-11FF (Hangul Jamo), 3130-318F (Hangul Compatibility Jamo)
# 
# For Latin-based languages (English, Spanish, French, etc.), leave this empty or comment it out
# to skip character detection entirely
UNICODE_RANGES = AC00-D7AF,1100-11FF,3130-318F

# Font mappings - map original game fonts to localized font assets
# Format: OriginalFontName = LocalizedFontAssetName
# The localized fonts must exist in fonts.unity3d asset bundle
[FONTS]
FugazOne-Regular = NanumSquareRoundEB
Heebo-Black = PaperlogyExtraBold
AlfaSlabOne-Regular = ROKAFSlabSerifBold
ArchivoBlack-Regular = PaperlogyExtraBold
Cour10Bd = D2Coding
RAGE = KyoboHandwriting2019
Dosis-SemiBold = TmoneyRoundWindExtraBold
Dosis-SemiBold LowCase = NanumSquareRoundEB
VT323-Regular = GalmuriMono11
DroidSerif-Bold = MaruBuri-Bold
PlayfairDisplay-Bold = MaruBuri-Bold
WalterTurncoat-Regular = MaruBuri-Bold
BLUEHIGD = D2Coding

# Position adjustments - adjust text position for specific UI elements
# Format: Conditions = X,Y,Z offset + [,FontSize,LineSpacing,WidthScale]
# Conditions support: Contains(path), EndsWith(path), StartsWith(path), !Contains(path)
# Multiple conditions separated by &
# Examples:
#   Contains(GUI/HUD) & EndsWith(/HUDLabel) = 0,-0.05,0
#   Contains(Screen) & !Contains(/Row) & EndsWith(/Text) = 0,0.25,0
# Some elements may be inverted in Y-axis; adjust accordingly
[POSITION_ADJUSTMENTS]
## HUD labels
Contains(GUI/HUD/) & EndsWith(/HUDLabel) = 0,-0.05,0
## Money ATM screen (excluding row elements)
Contains(PERAPORTTI/ATMs/MoneyATM/Screen) & !Contains(/Row) & EndsWith(/Text) = 0,0.25,0
## Fuel ATM screen header
Contains(PERAPORTTI/ATMs/FuelATM/Screen) & !Contains(/Row) & EndsWith(/Text) = 0,0.45,0
## Fuel ATM screen rows
Contains(PERAPORTTI/ATMs/FuelATM/Screen) & Contains(/Row) & EndsWith(/Text) = 0,-0.25,0
## Teletext TV
Contains(Systems/TV/Teletext/VKTekstiTV/PAGES/188/Texts/Updater/Ennuste/Temp) & EndsWith(/Short) = 1,-0.2,0
Contains(Systems/TV/Teletext/VKTekstiTV/PAGES/188/Texts/Updater/Nyt) & EndsWith(/Short) = -1,0,0
## TV Chat
Contains(Systems/TV/TVGraphics/CHAT/Generated/Lines) = 0,0,0,,,0.07
## Options
Contains(Systems/OptionsMenu) & Contains(/GUITextlabel) = 0,0,0,0.07
Contains(Systems/OptionsMenu) & Contains(/GUITextLabel) = 0,0,0,0.07
Contains(Systems/OptionsMenu) & Contains(/GUITextHeader) = 0,0,0,0.08
## Fleetari Service Payment Sheet
Contains(Sheets/ServicePayment) & EndsWith(ServicePayment/Text) = 0,-0.01,0,0.005
Contains(Sheets/ServicePayment) & EndsWith(ServicePayment/Text/Text) = 0,0.01,0
Contains(Sheets/ServicePayment/Line) = 0,0.002,0
## Unemployment Sheet
Contains(Sheets/UnemployPaper/2) = -0.01,0,0
## Computer
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/POS/) & EndsWith(/BIOS) = 0,0,0,2.4,
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/POS/) & EndsWith(/Text) = 0,0,0,2.4,
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/POS/) & EndsWith(/Command) = 0,0,0,2.4,
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/TELEBBS/Software) & EndsWith(/text 2) = 0,0,0,2.4,
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/TELEBBS/Software) & EndsWith(/BaudRate) = 0,0,0,2.4,
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/TELEBBS/Software) & EndsWith(/StatusBar) = 0,0,0,2.4,
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/TELEBBS/CONLINE) = 0,0,0,2.4,
